text: @elonmusk Free the world from psychopaths such as Elon Musk and his satellites!! There is almost 8bn people on this planet. Not one has been asked do we want his satellites, 5G radiation and IOT. This is where real danger is, not coronavirus. End monopoly over our sky and the planet!!
